text: Wilfred Jackson (January 24, 1906 - August 7, 1988) is an American animator, arranger, composer and director best known for his work on the Mickey Mouse and Silly Symphonies series and the Night on Bald Mountain/Ave Maria segment of Fantasia from Walt Disney Productions. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1906 births Category:1988 deaths Category:American animators Category:Artists from Chicago Category:Movie directors from Chicago
title: Wilfred Jackson
